predictions.text: Bitcoin (BTC-USD) will trade at or below $85,000 on at least one UTC day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirmed if CoinDesk BPI or CoinMarketCap "Daily Low" equals or falls below $85,000 on any UTC date through 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: BTC perpetual funding rates and open interest
Spot ETF flows and on-chain realized volatility
predictions.rationale: Momentum has weakened amid tech risk-off and thinning crypto liquidity. A brief capitulation wick is plausible.

predictions.text: Adobe Analytics will report U.S. Thanksgiving Day 2025 online spending of at least $6.2 billion.
predictions.verification_criteria: Adobe Digital Insights/Analytics press release or blog stating Thanksgiving Day 2025 U.S. online spend ≥ $6.2B.
monitoring_signals: Retailer promo intensity and average discount rates
predictions.rationale: Large discounts and pull-forward of demand typically buoy Thanksgiving spend; online penetration keeps rising.

predictions.text: Cboe Volatility Index (VIX) will close at or above 20.00 on at least one trading day by 2025-12-15 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Cboe official daily close for VIX ≥ 20.00 on any trading day through 2025-12-15 (UTC).
monitoring_signals: VVIX and VIX term structure inversion
predictions.rationale: Event risk into CPI/FOMC and fragile tech sentiment make a VIX ≥20 print likely.

predictions.text: ERCOT hourly wind generation will reach at least 32,000 MW on at least one hour by 2025-12-31 (CST).
predictions.verification_criteria: ERCOT dashboard or press release showing instantaneous or hourly wind generation ≥ 32,000 MW by 2025-12-31 (CST).
monitoring_signals: NWS wind-speed outlooks for West Texas/Gulf
predictions.rationale: Seasonal winds and growing installed capacity make a new or near-record peak plausible.

predictions.text: By 2025-12-15, U.S. Central Command will publicly announce at least one strike against Iran-aligned militia targets in Iraq or Syria.
predictions.verification_criteria: CENTCOM press release, statement, or official social media post specifying a U.S. strike in Iraq or Syria by 2025-12-15.
predictions.rationale: Persistent militia activity and regional spillover risks raise likelihood of U.S. self-defense strikes.

predictions.text: By 2025-12-05, Amazon Web Services will announce a new generation of its Trainium accelerator (e.g., Trainium 3) via an AWS News Blog post or press release during re:Invent.
predictions.verification_criteria: AWS official blog or press release published by 2025-12-05 announcing a next-generation Trainium chip.
monitoring_signals: Competitive chip disclosures (NVIDIA, AMD, Google TPU)
predictions.rationale: Competitive AI hardware cadence and re:Invent timing favor a Trainium update.

predictions.text: By 2025-12-31, CISA will add at least 20 CVEs to the Known Exploited Vulnerabilities (KEV) catalog with a Date Added between 2025-12-16 and 2025-12-31 inclusive.
predictions.verification_criteria: Count entries on CISA’s KEV catalog where "Date Added" is within 2025-12-16 to 2025-12-31 inclusive; total ≥ 20.
monitoring_signals: CISA alerts and Binding Operational Directives
predictions.rationale: Year-end patch cycles and active exploitation waves typically drive KEV additions.

predictions.text: The AAA U.S. national average price for regular gasoline will print at or below $2.95 per gallon on at least one reporting date by 2025-12-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: AAA Gas Prices national average displayed at or below $2.95/gal on any U.S. reporting date through 2025-12-31.
monitoring_signals: NYMEX RBOB futures and crack spreads
EIA gasoline stocks and refinery utilization
predictions.rationale: Soft demand, ample inventories, and benign crude could push national averages below $3.

predictions.text: The U.S. 10-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS10) will close at or below 4.00% on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: FRED DGS10 daily close ≤ 4.00% on any trading day through 2025-12-31 (UTC).
monitoring_signals: Term premium estimates and Treasury supply
predictions.rationale: Dovish Fed signals and slowing growth raise chances of a sub-4% 10Y print.

predictions.text: By 2025-12-20, the Council of the European Union will adopt a new Russia sanctions package, confirmed via an official Council press release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Publication of a Council of the EU press release announcing adoption of an additional Russia sanctions package by 2025-12-20.
monitoring_signals: Draft legal texts in EU Official Journal
predictions.rationale: EU commonly finalizes new Russia packages ahead of year-end alignment with partners.

predictions.text: Seasonally adjusted U.S. insured unemployment (continuing claims) will print at or above 1,900,000 in at least one Weekly Claims report released by 2025-12-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: U.S. Department of Labor weekly release shows seasonally adjusted insured unemployment (continuing claims) ≥ 1,900,000 by 2025-12-31.
monitoring_signals: Initial claims trend and state-level spikes
predictions.rationale: Labor demand is cooling; continuing claims typically lag higher in softening cycles.
